name: The Silent Battle
description:
Hello, we are Some Game Developers, a group of college students trying to hone our skills in order to become game developers some day, and that journey has taken us to this Gamejam.
We welcome you to The Silent Battle, a game PROTOTYPE that's been very personal to us as college students all studying and passing projects at home. We invite you to take part in a journey of self discovery, of conquering your fears, facing them with courage unbounded by the thoughts that weigh you down. As your group leader begins to pressure you, your own doubts begin to manifests into monsters inside your nightmare where you are defenseless and the only way for you to stay out of harms way is to run.
